titleStmt.title: A true relation of Go[ds] vvonderfull mercies in preseruing one aliue, which hanged fiue dayes, who was falsely accused.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Allde dwelling on Lumbard-hill, [..,

notesStmt.note: Year of publication suggested by STC.
One aliue, which hanged fiue dayes = John Johnson, of Antwerp.
Imperfect; trimmed, affecting title and imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
